original_title: Lady Lovely Locks and the Pixietails: The Dragon Tree
overview: Beware of mother dragons! Longcurl the dragon is so upset she's breathing fire! Someone has taken her babies from their nest and Longcurl is certain they are being hidden in the royal castle of Lovelylocks. Could this be another sinister scheme by Duchess Ravenwaves to take over the peaceful land?
title: Lady Lovely Locks and the Pixietails: The Dragon Tree
